name: Team Extension
description:
Team Extension is a nearshoring and offshoring technology company based in Bucharest, Romania.

Our company's mission is to hunt and hire the best talents in the technology field, wherever they are. We particularly excel in the cutting-edge tech area, such as iOS, Android, Java, and more. We provide resources on-site and off-site (remote). We work with a wide spectrum of clients, including startups and Fortune 500 companies that are based in Western Europe and in the United States.
READ MORE...
